ThingDef.label: RimCoin
ThingDef.description: The first digital currency ever established in the Rim. Its legacy laid the foundation for everything that followed. Many coins strive to match its influence on the blockchain.

ThingDef.label: TurboThrumbo
ThingDef.description: A rare and elusive coin, known to surge into the market like a thrumbo in the wild — sudden, majestic, and gone before you can catch it.

ThingDef.label: BoomalopeChain
ThingDef.description: Unpredictable and resourceful, BoomalopeCoin can explode in value out of nowhere — sometimes a blessing, sometimes a mess.

ThingDef.label: GlitterGold
ThingDef.description: Backed by prestige and perfection, GlitterCoin radiates universal value. Trusted across civilizations, its reputation alone is enough to move markets.

ThingDef.label: BitLuciferium
ThingDef.description: Blazing hot and dangerously addictive, LuciferiumCoin is the kind of asset that’ll take you out of this world — for better or worse.

ThingDef.label: MetaMuffalo
ThingDef.description: A comforting, fluffy investment — coins are said to get lost in the fur and multiply over time. Slow-moving, but surprisingly reliable.

ThingDef.label: PoplarCash
ThingDef.description: Grows tall, fast, and steady — PoplarCoin is rooted in strength and rises like a tree. Solid as wood, and just as dependable.

ThingDef.label: MiniRaiders
ThingDef.description: Born from the chaos of the Rim, RaidersCoin represents the spoils of constant conflict. In a world where raids never end, there’s always profit to be made.

ThingDef.label: RitualOS
ThingDef.description: Summoned through ancient rites and shimmering offerings, RitualCoin channels wealth into existence. Call upon the gods — and they just might answer.

ThingDef.label: CyberFallout
ThingDef.description: A remnant of a collapsed economy, FalloutCoin lingers like dust in the wind. Fragile, volatile, and somehow... still traded.
